scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker leverages carefully crafted inputs to the model and analyzes the outputs to infer protected attributes like income levels and purchase history.
initial_goal: Develop a model to predict customer churn based on provided anonymized customer data.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking:  The model is deployed by a large bank to predict which customers are likely to churn, allowing for proactive retention efforts. The anonymized data still contains subtle correlations that can be exploited.
